name: Rustavi2 Broadcasting Company
goal:
Rustavi2 Broadcasting Company is one of the biggest private Broadcasting companies not only in Georgia but in the region. Rustavi 2 has an openly stated editorial policy favorable towards the pro-Western opposition parties. We do our best to popularize western values and the idea of Euro-Atlantic Integration and counter Russian propaganda which is nowadays flourishing in our country.
The main goal of our company is to provide unbiased factual information to the population of Georgia, carry out journalistic investigations, counter Russian propganda and fake news.
interests: Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Enlargement, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Currently ,we have a special program aimed at filling in the existing knowledge gaps and eliminate misconceptions about the EU. The main goal is to counteract Russian propaganda, to popularize the information about the EU in already existing high rating format and provide the Georgian population with timely information that would reassure about reforms and the EU integration process and, at the same time, dissipate myths boosted by anti-EU and skeptical segments of the Georgian population that still believe that the EU integration process would entail the corruption of the historical Georgian values and the Georgian society as a whole.
Another program is dedicated to standards included in the DCFTA.
Our field of interest are the reforms of the judiciary, the democracy building process including such topics as situation with minority rights , strengthening role of women, etc.
